name: Les maîtres du temps
summary: Piel, a 7 or 8 year old boy, is alone on the desert planet Perdide, only survivor of an attack by giant hornets. Calling for help, Piel's father's friend Jaffar keeps contact with the kid and hurries across space toward Perdide.
info:
• 中文名: 时间之主
  • 话数: 1
  • 别名: The Masters of Time
  • 别名: Time Masters
  • 上映年度: 1982-03-24
  • 片长: 78 分钟
  • 导演: 阿内·拉鲁
  • 编剧: Jean-Patrick Manchette / René Laloux / Jean Giraud(Moebius) / Stefan Wul
